catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 486
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: text at beginning; scenes of shoreline along river, looking on from river; images of buildings and people along shoreline; changing weather in scenes: people flying kites in summer; fall foliage; winter storm at end; view is occasionally obscured by bridge undergirding and pylons
markings: Seals at beginning: [Raikindo]; [Genrin no in]; [Toko koji]
medium: Ink and color printed on paper
signed: Signed and dated at beginning: [Inscribed by Toko Genrin / summer 1781]
title: Both Banks of the Sumida River
